name: RenewDomain
description: Renews a domain registration through Vercel.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.description: The domain name to be renewed, in string format.

parameters.name: domain_renewal_details
parameters.description: JSON object with details for renewing a domain, including years, expected price, and contact info.

years.description: The number of years to renew the domain for.

expectedPrice.description: The expected price for the domain. Use the [Get price data for a domain](https://vercel.com/docs/rest-api/reference/endpoints/domains-registrar/get-price-data-for-a-domain) endpoint to retrieve the price data for a domain.

country.description: A valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team that owns the domain.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

years.description: The number of years to renew the domain for.

expectedPrice.description: The expected price for the domain. Use the [Get price data for a domain](https://vercel.com/docs/rest-api/reference/endpoints/domains-registrar/get-price-data-for-a-domain) endpoint to retrieve the price data for a domain.

country.description: A valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code
